- **Confidence**: High (Verified/Obvious)
- **Reasoning**: The command is focused on controlling the dishwasher to set an appropriate cleaning mode. Since there is no specific user preference for cleaning settings, I will query the dishwasher for its available washing options using the `samsungce.dishwasherWashingOptions` capability.
